title: Russia claims Odesa attack hit only military targets; envoy says Ukraine kids kidnapped: Live updates
content:
1. Russia claims Odesa attack hit only military targets; envoy says Ukraine kids kidnapped: Live updates  USA TODAY
  2. Russia claims responsibility for missile strike on Ukrainian port city 1 day after agreeing to allow exports  Fox News
  3. Smoke rises from the port in Odesa, Ukraine, following a Russian missile strike  6abc Philadelphia
  4. Russia struck military boat in Odesa with cruise missiles - foreign ministry says  Yahoo News
  5. Ukrainian ambassador to U.S. says Russian attack on port shows need for more weapons  Face the Nation
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
